creator: joelr@viair.com
text:
In order to specify the log file, I must use:
log4j.appender.myappender.File=/mylog.log

This is unusual in that people should be able to specify the following:
log4j.appender.myappender.File=mylog.log

In either case, the introspection process should not choke on the above 
property input.
log4j:WARN Failed to set property file to value "mylog.log". null

Hmmm... this looks very strange. Can I see the whole configuration file? 
Thanks, Ceki
creator: cgu@qos.ch
